item.title: You Won't Believe What Happens When You Install Windows 11 on WSL 2!
item.description: Introduction Have you heard about Windows 11 and WSL 2? If you’re not familiar with them, don’t worry - we’ll explain what they are and why you should consider installing Windows 11 on WSL 2. What is Windows 11? Windows 11 is the latest version of Microsoft’s Windows operating system. It offers a range of new features and improvements, including a new Start menu, improved security, and better performance. What is WSL 2?
